FuncDef: The hwtacacs-server traffic-unit command sets the traffic unit used by an HWTACACS server. The undo hwtacacs-server traffic-unit command restores the default traffic unit used by the HWTACACS server. By default, the traffic unit is byte on the device.
CLIs: hwtacacs-server traffic-unit { byte | kbyte | mbyte | gbyte }

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the traffic unit is byte.
-

Indicates that the traffic unit is KByte.
-

Indicates that the traffic unit is MByte.
-

Indicates that the traffic unit is GByte.
-

ExtraInfo: Different HWTACACS servers may use different traffic units; therefore, you need to set the traffic unit for each HWTACACS server group on the device and the traffic unit must be the same as that on the HWTACACS server.
